reviews.review: Tons of fun, especially when you play wioth friends!

I havent played the game all that much recently but its a great time to play with friends and solo 
its probably one of the funniest games to play with a few friends but if you are a solo player you can kill people and save people when ever you want.

But you know what, i dont fucking care about them anymore, adding NFTs to your fucking game is unacceptable and i refuse to support it. please follow suit and DONT BUY THIS GAME. Oh btw, the nfts are a pyramid scheme, seriously dont buy this game

they're losing so many players that they start labelling character as gay, so the woke part of the community doesn't leave as well haha

This game is ADDICTIVE!  You can tell that this game was a labor of love for the Devs.  It was clearly, Horror fans creating content that lives up to the standards of those of us who play Horror.  Just recently,  I just got thrown into the RE Raccoon City Police Department map, and I got so many feels. THE DETAIL?  Unbelievable...I didn't know if I wanted to cry, die or take a tour,  I knew then, that I'll always play this game and it will always rate within my top, best, replayable games.
Excellent game. One of the best multiplayer games out there.

the game is really fun when you have friends on but i wont play it alone most of the shit is alot more balanced then what it used to be but in general some bugs still can annoy you but none are really game braking. the dbd team have done very well to give the game content and fix all the shit bugs from a few years back in and over all your gonna get tunneled and camped
